com.rbennett485.dawnoftheveg.data

Class Progress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbennett485.dawnoftheveg.data.Progress

  • public class Progress
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores, securely saves and loads all measures of player progress in game
    Author:
    Bennett_Richard

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static void load(com.badlogic.androidgames.framework.FileIO files)
        Loads the progress data from file. If this fails (including if no progress file exists) then default values are used
        Parameters:
        files - The FileIO instance to use

      • save

        public static void save(com.badlogic.androidgames.framework.FileIO files)
        Saves the current values of all progress fields to internal storage. Takes no action if this fails for any reason
        Parameters:
        files - The FileIO instance to use
